author: dkuntz2
name: DK Cinnamon
description:
A darker theme for cinnamon.

Basically I was annoyed with how some of the cinnamon-themes repo themes were working, and I was bored with the default theme, so I made this. It's pretty similar to the default theme, but with some color tweaks (more towards black, the rgb(80,80,80) bugged me) and more padding.
